    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static DatabaseConnection getInstance()
        Returns or creates an instance of database connection. Does not establish the connection.
        Returns:
        singleton instance of the DatabaseConnection object.

        Gets boolean with the state of the connection to the database
        Returns:
        boolean, that contains the connection state

      • getUserEmail

        Gets the User email attribute associated
        Returns:
        String, that contains the user's email

      • connect

        public javafx.util.Pair<java.lang.Boolean,​java.lang.String> connect​(java.lang.String username,
                                                                          java.lang.String password)
        Attempts to establish a connection to the database with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        username - a username
        password - a password
        Returns:
        a Boolean, String pair. The Boolean represents the success of the connection. If false, the connection failed and the String contains the appropriate error message.

      • select

        Attempts to make a select action on the db.
        Parameters:
        query - is the query
        Returns:
        ResultSet, that contains the result of a select

        Parameters:

        values - are the values to insert
